description: Interactive CLI Setup Wizard - Guide users through initial configuration

tasks.title: Scaffold Setup Wizard & Dependency Installation
tasks.description: As a developer, I want the project structure for the CLI wizard ready with necessary dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: Install 'inquirer' and 'chalk' (and types) as dev dependencies
Create a 'WizardConfig' interface for type safety
Add a 'setup' script to package.json running 'ts-node scripts/setup-wizard.ts'

tasks.title: Implement Environment Detection & Loading
tasks.description: As a user, I want the wizard to respect my existing configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: Read current .env file if it exists
Populate defaults in the wizard based on existing values
Detect system IP address automatically for default suggestion
Tests pass (mocking fs and network interfaces)

tasks.title: Implement Configuration Prompts (Inquirer)
tasks.description: As a user, I want to be asked simple questions to configure the app.

tasks.title: Implement Configuration Writing & Secrets Generation
tasks.description: As a user, I want my answers saved and security keys generated automatically.
acceptanceCriteria: Write all values to .env file (preserving comments if possible, or just overwriting safely)
Output success message with 'npm run dev' instruction
